title: 754: BITCOIN WILL EASILY TRADE AT $500K A COIN, SAYS SKYBRIDGE CAPITAL CEO!! BTC IS ‘GOING UP’ FOREVER!!
description:
Anthony Scaramucci of Skybridge Capital, has a long-term view of the Bitcoin price based on solid fundamentals. If he’s right, the BTC price could shatter even some of the most bullish of predictions.

He told CNBC Bitcoin could “easily trade at $500K a coin,” pointing to the number of high-net-worth individuals vs. the finite supply of the cryptocurrency to go around.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
